name: Save new Authvia customers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new customer is created in Authvia, Make will automatically add that customer to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iBfT3NrzMI9l9E1PQA_SSfLGniJerC3Jl1X309sQMEs/edit?usp=sharing).
